name: UpdateWorkflowsWebhookHandle
description:
Update a webhook handle in Datadog's Microsoft Teams integration.

This tool updates a Workflows webhook handle for the Datadog Microsoft Teams integration. Use it to modify existing webhook configurations.

parameters.name: webhook_handle_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Workflows webhook handle to be updated.

parameters.name: webhook_handle_resource_type
parameters.description: Specifies the Workflows webhook handle resource type. Use 'workflows-webhook-handle'.

value_schema.description: Specifies the Workflows webhook handle resource type.

parameters.name: webhook_handle_name
parameters.description: The name of the Workflows Webhook handle to be updated. This should be a descriptive string identifying the webhook.

parameters.name: workflows_webhook_url
parameters.description: The URL for the Workflows Webhook. Specify the endpoint to send requests to.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: data.type
parameters.description: Specifies the Workflows webhook handle resource type.

value_schema.description: Specifies the Workflows webhook handle resource type.
